item.title: Understand Kubernetes Primitives
item.description: API Primitives Primitive Structure: API Version, kind, metadata, spec, status. Practice creating a new YAML or modifying an existing one. apiVersion: v1 kind: Pod metadata: labels: run: nginx name: nginx spec: containers: - image: nginx name: nginx resources: {} dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst restartPolicy: Never status: {} Object Management (create, get, update, delete) kubectl run nginx --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > nginx.yaml kubectl run hazelcast --image=hazelcast/hazelcast --env="DNS_DOMAIN=cluster" --env="POD_NAMESPACE=default"
